title: Is technology ruining our younger generation? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yep, the same way those new-fangled sharpened sticks spoiled them 50,000 years ago! What’s wrong with throwing stones, I asks ya? Bloody panty-waists! Here’s the Four Yorkshiremen sketch, from Monty Python, Live at the Hollywood Bowl, three of the funniest minutes ever recorded, and an object lesson to those who continually find the generation after theirs not up to your impossible standards: Four Yorkshiremen.

That depends on the use of it. If you are 24/7 on it so much that you ignore that you have other responsibilities, then yes, it’s ruining. Technology can be used as source of entertainment and education. It can also be a cause of distress, breaking homes if used the wrong way like [being so involved in it that you are passively listening to others at home, cheating on spouse etc]
